answers.answer: Yea. Im 23 and my girl weighs over a pound. We are testing for diabetes first. I have mostly food aversions - so dont really overeat...she wants chicken breast mostly. I think shes just gonna be a big girl! Dad weighed almost 11 and I was over 9.
I've already tested and came back negative...I just eat alot!!! It's hard to cut down!!
27 weeks & she's 2.5 pounds,  but I haven't gained any weight,  I've lost 30 so well have to wait and see I guess
I've gained alot already...almost 60lbs plus my last baby was big to 10.3
At 24 weeks, they estimated my baby just under 2 lbs (1 lb 14 ounces).  I'll be 27 weeks in 2 days, so I'm sure she's significantly bigger 3 weeks later.  Oye!
I'm 25w n he weighs 2lbs 2oz now I go back on the 15th doc said he gonna be big my last girl was ova 8lbs
My last was 10.3!! So she'll probably be big as well

I'm 27w,1d. I saw my specialist today. Baby's weighs 2 lbs, 9oz. I've only gained 20 pounds. I have been losing and I'm just now starting to gain. My last baby was 10 lbs, 2 oz. and I had gained 65 lbs with her. And I've never had gestational diabetes.

I'm 27w,1d. I saw my specialist today. Baby weighs 2 lbs, 9oz. I've only gained 20 pounds. I have been losing and I'm just now starting to gain. My last baby was 10 lbs, 2 oz. and I had gained 65 lbs with her. And I've never had gestational diabetes.

As of 20weeks, my boy was already 1lb. Just had my 24week appointment yesterday and I've gained 13lbs so far and we didn't do an ultrasound, but they're still estimating him to be a big boy! Most of the children in my family were near 10lbs at birth, so I'm kind of terrified for what these last 3mos will bring! Haha.

question: How far along are yall and how much does baby weigh?? I'm 27wks and baby weighs 2.5lbs. They told me she's gonna be a big baby!! So dieting and watching carbs would be best....
title: BABY WEIGHT....ANYONE ELSE WITH A BiG BABY EARLY ON
